alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Denver; Douglas; Jefferson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 5:15PM MDT until July 26 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Douglas County in northeastern Colorado... Southwestern Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... Southwestern Denver County in northeastern Colorado... East central Jefferson County in central Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 514 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Morrison, or 13 miles southwest of Denver, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vegetation is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Southern Lakewood around 530 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Chatfield Reservoir, northwestern Highlands Ranch, Littleton, Englewood and Sheridan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
